commit.message:
SYNCOPE-199 Fix ability to close a modal page on pressing ESC key

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/syncope/trunk@1434678 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

files.patch:
@@ -49,7 +49,7 @@
 
     </style>
   </head>
-  <body onload="window.focus()">
+  <body onload="setTimeout('window.focus();', 0);">
     <div wicket:id="feedback"/>
 
   <wicket:child />
